text: Copa México is the main knockout cup competition in Mexican football. The competition was established in 1907. == Champions == === Amateur era === {| align=left border=1 width=80% cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%; text-align: center;" Club Champion Runner-up Asturias 8 6 Club España 4 6 Necaxa 4 2 Pachuca 2 2 Reforma 2 3 México 2 2 América 1 3 British 1 0 Rovers 1 0 Atlante 1 0 Moctezuma 1 0 === Professional era === {| align=left border=1 width=80% cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%; text-align: center;" CLUB CHAMPION RUNNER-UP León 5 4 América 5 3 Puebla 4 2 Atlas 4 1 Cruz Azul 3 2 Tigres UANL 3 1 Necaxa 3 0 Guadalajara 2 5 Atlante 2 4 Zacatepec 2 2 Toluca 2 1 Veracruz 1 3 Tampico Madero 1 2 U. de G. 1 2 Monterrey 1 2 Morelia 1 1 Club España 1 0 Moctezuma 1 0 UNAM 1 0 Dorados de Sinaloa 1 0 Oro 0 1 Irapuato 0 1 Torreón 0 1 Cobras 0 1 Neza 0 1 Correcaminos 0 1 Alebrijes 0 1 Category:Football competitions Category:Football in Mexico Category:1907 establishments in North America Category:1900s establishments in Mexico
title: Copa México
